entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Manicouagan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac Manouane East 02:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: -9.5°C
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: -10.4°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
